= Glossary =

  * _iid_ = itemId, integer > 0
  * TID = tagId, integer > 0
  * _rid_ = relationId, integer > 0
  * _rvsn_ = relationVersion, integer > 0
  * _cid_ = commentId, integer > 0
  * _format_ = `"xml"` | `"json"`
  * _key_ = structure element name, eg: "relationName", camelcase, case-sensitive
